channel.title: Vengeance PK
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/Untitled-1copy-3.png[/img]
[b][i][u][size=14pt]Things about me and Vengeance PK[/size][/u][/i][/b] [i][b]Vengeance Pk has been a project for about 4-5 months now. It is a 317 delta server, originally from BallScape source. I am 14 years old and started to code for about 3 years. I am not a HUGE coder like deathschaos9, Frell, SilentCJ, I Vain I, 'Aaron, and some other really good coders, but I'm an okay coder I guess. When Vengeance PK goes up, I will try my best to make updates monthly to keep players active.[/b][/i]
[b][i][u][size=14pt]Things on the Server![/size][/u][/i][/b] 1. Custom Npcs 2. Donor Interface 3. Minigame Interface 4. Donor Zone + rank 5. Godsword 2H 100% 6. Castle Wars 7. Exp Lock Options 8. Duel Arena 9. Fixed Dupes 10. Barrows 11. Working Barrages 12. Skill Interfaces 13. Quests 14. Bandos Gwd 15. 100% Working Clan Chat 16. Pest Control w/ Spinners 17. Bounty Hunter
[size=14pt][b][i][u]Goals[/u][/i][/b][/size]
[ul][li][b][i]Have atleast 30+ players usually everyday[/li] [li][b][i]Receive enough donations to get a Vbulletin Forum[/li] [li][b][i]To make Vengeance PK popular :)[/li] [li][b][i]For People to PK daily[/li][/ul]
[b][i](I know some of these "Goals" are stupid)
[b][i][u][size=14pt]All staff must follow these:[/size][/u][/i][/b]
[ul][li][b][i]You cannot take a code from the server and give it to one of your friends![/b][/li] [li][b][i]You cannot add something to the server/client/website without my permission.[/b][/li] [li][b][i]You obviously cannot ruin the server/client/website somehow on purpose.[/b][/li] [li][b][i]You must have an MSN, yahoo, etc.[/b][/li] [li][b][i]You have to be atleast the age of 14![/b][/li] [li][b][i]You cannot upload the source or client and give it to your friend or anyone.[/b][/li][/ul]
[b][i][u][size=14pt]Staff Application[/size][/u][/i][/b] [i][b]Name[/b][/i]: [i][b]Age[/b][/i]: [i][b]Country of residence[/b][/i]: [i][b]Email[/b][/i]: (you may choose to PM me this information if you want) [i][b]MSN[/b][/i]: (you may choose to PM me this information if you want) [i][b]Applying for: (choose) [i][b]Web Designer Graphics Designer Java Coder Article Writer Content Manager Debugger & Beta Tester Customer Support [/b][/i]

item.title: Vengeance PK
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]Things about me and Vengeance PK[/size]
Vengeance Pk has been a project for about 4-5 months now. It is a 317 delta server, originally from BallScape source. I am 14 years old and started to code for about 3 years. I am not a HUGE coder like deathschaos9, Frell, SilentCJ, I Vain I, 'Aaron, and some other really good coders, but I’m an okay coder I guess. When Vengeance PK goes up, I will try my best to make updates monthly to keep players active.

[size=14pt]Things on the Server![/size]

  1. Custom Npcs
  2. Donor Interface
  3. Minigame Interface
  4. Donor Zone + rank
  5. Godsword 2H 100%
  6. Castle Wars
  7. Exp Lock Options
  8. Duel Arena
  9. Fixed Dupes
  10. Barrows
  11. Working Barrages
  12. Skill Interfaces
  13. Quests
  14. Bandos Gwd
  15. 100% Working Clan Chat
  16. Pest Control w/ Spinners
  17. Bounty Hunter

[size=14pt]Goals[/size]

[ul][li][b][i]Have atleast 30+ players usually everyday[/li]
[li][b][i]Receive enough donations to get a Vbulletin Forum[/li]
[li][b][i]To make Vengeance PK popular :)[/li]
[li][b][i]For People to PK daily[/li][/ul]

[b][i](I know some of these “Goals” are stupid)

[size=14pt]All staff must follow these:[/size]

[ul][li][i]You cannot take a code from the server and give it to one of your friends![/li]
[li][i]You cannot add something to the server/client/website without my permission.[/li]
[li][i]You obviously cannot ruin the server/client/website somehow on purpose.[/li]
[li][i]You must have an MSN, yahoo, etc.[/li]
[li][i]You have to be atleast the age of 14![/li]
[li][i]You cannot upload the source or client and give it to your friend or anyone.[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Staff Application[/size]
Name:
Age:
Country of residence:
Email: (you may choose to PM me this information if you want)
MSN: (you may choose to PM me this information if you want)
[i][b]Applying for: (choose)
Web Designer
